thread.title: LSU creates a home-like atmosphere for South Carolina

title: LSU creates a home-like atmosphere for South Carolina
text:
> South Carolina LSU creates a home-like atmosphere for South Carolina The South Carolina state flag, top right, and the South Carolina University flag fly over Tiger Stadium during the first half of an NCAA college football game between LSU and South Carolina in Baton Rouge, La., Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. (AP Photo/Jonathan Bachman) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
